text: Gei digaula gaa hai di nadau hegau gi di king go Hezekiah bolo gi hanimoi, gei ana gau aamua dogodolu guu hula belee heetugi gi digaula, aanei laa tama daane a Hilkiah go Eliakim dela e madamada humalia di hale di king, mo Shebna, tangada hihi di gowaa hai gabunga, mo tama daane o Asaph go Joah dela nogo hai tangada benebene nia beebaa hagalangahia.
